definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 8:8; only pl . cattle (Ph. [[אלף]], As. alpu, COT:Gloss)—[[אֲלָפִים]] Pr 14:4, Is 30:24 used in tillage; subject to man Ps 8:8 (‖[[חׂנֶה]]); their increase [[שְׁגַר אֲלָפֶיךָ]] a blessing De 7:13, De 28:4, De 28:18, De 28:51 (‖ all [[עַשְׁתִּרׂת חאׁנֶ֑ךָ]]).
